scripts.build:dev: openfl process assets/layout.swf bin/js-debug/layout.bundle && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-debug && asconfigc --debug=true
scripts.build:prod: openfl process assets/layout.swf bin/js-release/layout.bundle && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-release && asconfigc --debug=false
